```coq
intros st e l st' c i o i' o'.
pose proof (cacheApplyEntry_clientCache st e l st') as Hcache.
destruct Hcache as [(HclientCache & Hexist) | HnotExist].
+ destruct Hexist as (i'' & o'' & HgetLastId & _).
  apply le_trans with (i''); auto.
+ apply getLastId_None in HnotExist.
  contradiction.
Qed.
```
